markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nimble Crawl](/Feats.aspx?ID=816) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 264 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You can Crawl incredibly swiftly—up to half your Speed, rather than 5 feet. If you’re a master in Acrobatics, you can Crawl at full Speed, and if you’re legendary, you aren’t flat-footed while prone.
name: Nimble Crawl

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 264 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<summary>
Crawl at a faster rate.
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Standard" > Nimble Crawl Source Core Rulebook pg. 264 4.0 Prerequisites Expert in Acrobatics --- You can Crawl incredibly swiftly—up to half your Speed, rather than 5 feet. If you’re a master in Acrobatics, you can Crawl at full Speed, and if you’re legendary, you aren’t flat-footed while prone.
